Header: Afghanistan Ambassador Meets Commander of the Army
Content: HE M Ashraf Haidari, Ambassador of Afghanistan for Sri Lanka on Wednesday (5) paid a courtesy call on the Commander of the Army, Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake at the Army Headquarters, Colombo upon his recent assumption of office in Sri Lanka. The Ambassador was welcomed by Major General Ajith Wijesinghe, Military Secretary and Colonel Udaya Kumara, Military Assistant at the entrance to the Commander’s Secretariat. During the cordial meeting, Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake, and the visiting Afghanistan Ambassador exchanged views on bilateral matters of mutual interest with focus on ongoing Army-involved development roles. Towards the end of the friendly meeting, Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake presented a memento to the envoy as a token of goodwill and understanding. He left his compliments in the Visitors’ Book before his exit.
